changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO hotel.dict_countries (id, country, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CONCAT('Country', gs) AS country, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 300) AS gs;

INSERT INTO hotel.dict_cities (id, city, country_id, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CONCAT('City', gs) AS city, ROUND(1 + random() * 299) AS country_id, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 1000) AS gs;

INSERT INTO hotel.addresses (id, street, house_number, country_id, city_id, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CASE WHEN random() < 0.5 THEN 'Zhilunovicha' ELSE 'Polessia' END AS street, CONCAT(gs, 'a') AS house_number, ROUND(1 + random() * 299) AS country_id, ROUND(1 + random() * 999) AS city_id, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 10000) AS gs;

INSERT INTO hotel.hotels (id, name, rating, address_id, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CONCAT('Hotel', gs) AS name, CASE WHEN random() < 0.5 THEN 5 ELSE 4 END AS rating, gs AS address_id, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 1000) AS gs;

INSERT INTO hotel.room_types (id, room_type, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CONCAT('Standard', gs) AS room_type, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 10) AS gs;
CREATE TEMP TABLE tmp_hotel_room_counts AS SELECT id AS hotel_id, FLOOR(random() * 9001 + 1000)::int AS room_count FROM hotel.hotels;

INSERT INTO hotel.rooms (id, description, room_type_id, hotel_id, active, created, updated) SELECT row_number() OVER () AS id, CONCAT('Room ', gs, ' in hotel ', t.hotel_id) AS description, ROUND(1 + random() * 9) AS room_type_id, t.hotel_id, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM tmp_hotel_room_counts t, generate_series(1, t.room_count) AS gs
